name: Metagross
author: Ryuta Fuse
flavor_text: Because the magnetic powers of these Pokémon get stronger in freezing temperatures, Metagross living on snowy mountains are full of energy.

abilities.name: Emergency Entry
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if you drew this Pokémon from your deck at the beginning of your turn and your Bench isn’t full, before you put it into your hand, you may put it onto your Bench. If you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Meteor Mash
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Meteor Mash attack does 100 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
